properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM ONEDAYCLASS WHERE ONE_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, D.* FROM ( SELECT ONE_NO , ONE_TITLE , ONE_PLACE , ENT_PEOPLE , SCORE , PRICE , FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG" FROM ONEDAYCLASS O LEFT JOIN ATTECHMENT A USING(ONE_NO) WHERE ONE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY ONE_NO DESC )D ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT ONE_NO , ONE_TITLE , SCORE , PRICE , FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG" FROM ONEDAYCLASS O LEFT JOIN ATTECHMENT A USING(ONE_NO) WHERE ONE_STATUS = 'Y' AND ROWNUM <= 15 ORDER BY SCORE DESC, 4
